description: 1 x Mature Birch (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 10.00m: Left hand boundary: Thin crown density by approximately 10%-15%. Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure up to approximately 1.20m. Remove dead wood throughout crown. General maintenance.1 x Mature Acer (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 5.00m-6.00m: Thin crown density by approximately 15%-20%. General maintenance.4 x Purple Plums (applicants ref. T3,T4,T5,T6) - Approximately 7.00m: Thin crown density by approximately 20% concentrating mainly on epicormic shoots. Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches overhanging the football area by up to 1.20m. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.1 x Gleditsia (applicants ref. T7) - Approximately 9.00m: Remove broken hung section of the crown (storm damage). Thin crown density by approximately 20%. Reduce remaining crown by approximately 1.20m. General maintenance.2 x Mature Yews (applicants ref. T8-T9) - Approximately 6.00m-7.00m: Reduce both trees by approximately 1.20m. General maintenance.1 x Cedar (applicants ref. T10) - Approximately 12.00m: Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure up to approximately 1.25m-1.75m. Remove major dead wood throughout the crown. General maintenance.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
